welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rodriguez, Philippines! Known for its stunning natural landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its charm. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here.

restaurants.name: Aling Merced's Goto
restaurants.description: Aling Merced's Goto is a soup spot located in San Mateo.

restaurants.name: Il Padrino Coffee
restaurants.description: Il Padrino Coffee is a café located in Quezon City.
restaurants.address: Unit 1 Mt. Sinai Hts. Bldg., (71-B Commonwealth Ave., East Fairview), 1121 Quezon City, Quezon City

restaurants.name: Clubhouse, Greenland Newtwon
restaurants.description: Clubhouse, Greenland Newtwon is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pedro 'N Coi
restaurants.description: Pedro 'N Coi is a filipino restaurant located in Quezon City.

restaurants.name: Tri Mo Shawarma Co
restaurants.description: Tri Mo Shawarma Co is a middle eastern restaurant located in Quezon City.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is primarily used for international flights and is the home base of Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small domestic terminal operated by AirAsia Philippines and Cebgo.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving domestic flights to and from various destinations in the Philippines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to charter flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all areas of the airport, but may have limited connectivity at times.
